name: When Sorrows Come - TOJam Demo
description:
"You had to choose this path... Didn't you?"

Travel down the path between righteousness or decimation and save the Chief of your village!! Defeat the one who has captured him, but watch your timing as you go.

Controls: Keyboard

  • A / D or Left/Right - Move
  • W or Up - Jump
  • J / C / Joystick0 - Attack
  • K / X / Joystick1 - Parry
  • Esc / Joystick7 - Pause (q to quit)

TOJam 2021 - May 14th-16th

The Team:

  • Gameplay Programming: Kenny Su, Juan Callejas
  • Additional Programming: Tyson Moll, Eyad Tawfik, Alexandro Di Nunzio
  • Technical Artists: Alexandro Di Nunzio, Tyson Moll
  • Pixel Artist: Tyson Moll, Cindy Vu
  • Level Designers: Eyad Tawfik, Alexandro Di Nunzio
  • SFX / Music Composer: Millar McIlwain
